name: Imperi II
description: After you grew the province, the Imperi wants you to step down. You refuse and are now at war with the Imperi. Will you become Emperor or will you be supplanted?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Pentium Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 display or above Storage: 330 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1920 x 1080 resolution display or above Storage: 330 MB available space
